correlationId.description: The object ID of the correlation identifier for the specified record.
correlationId.name: correlationId

tenantId.description: The object ID of the tenant to operate against.
tenantId.name: tenantId

channelName.description: Name of the deploy channel to operate against.
channelName.name: channelName

channelRing.description: Integer number representing ring to operate against.
channelRing.name: number

customerId.description: The object ID of the customer value to operate against.
customerId.name: customerId

401.description: Principal is not authorized to access this endpoint. Check to make sure the Bearer token is valid and present!

403.description: Principal does not contain the correct scopes (permissions) for the API call that was made, or was made from the wrong tenant. If the permissions were granted, ensure that the access token was requested with the correct scopes.

404.description: The requested object was not found.

503.description: App is starting still. Feature is not available. Please try again later.

525.description: Infrastructure not deployed. Please deploy the infrastructure before using this endpoint.

Core.HealthReport.description: Health report that indicates if a service is down or not that the data gateway relies on.

authClient.description: Flag that indicates if the client side authentication validation is working or not.

authServer.description: Flag that indicates if the server side authentication is working or not.

bulkStorage.description: Flag that indicates if the bulk storage system is down (`false`) or not (`true`). False indicate the service is not working, true indicates the service is working.

database.description: Flag that indicates if the ORM (Database) system is down (`false`) or not (`true`). False indicate the service is not working, true indicates the service is working.

Core.HealthReport.title: Core System - Health Report

LicenseReport.CorrelationRecord.description: Metadata that describes the execution session (run) that is used to tie/relate all of the license report together.

AuditTenantAccount.description: The user account used to retrieve the license information in the tenant being audited.

CorrelationId.description: The ID of the execution session (run) that is used to tie/relate all of the data together.

ReportTenantAccount.description: User account used to store/report the license report to the SHI Lab cloud service.

TenantId.description: Unique ID of customer's Microsoft tenant that the license report is for.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the report was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the report was last updated.

LicenseReport.CorrelationRecord.title: License Report - Correlation Record

AssignedLicense.description: License assignment on the specified principal.

AssignedService.description: Service configuration assignment.  This is used to record the set of principals that are "benefiting" from the service, regardless of license status.

ConsumedService.description: Usage telemetry retrieved for the service to indicate if the specific principal is consuming the service or not, regardless of license status.

LicenseReport.LicenseData.description: Collection of principals that have had their in-use licenses and assigned licenses. Where the key is the principal ID and the value is the insights.
LicenseReport.LicenseData.title: License Report - License Data

LicenseReport.FeatureBreakdown.description:
List of features that are configured for the specific service plan's service configuration for the related principal.
The key is the name of the feature that is being described.
The value is the state of the feature configuration, `true` is in scope and `false` meaning not in scope.
LicenseReport.FeatureBreakdown.title: License Report - Feature Breakdown

LicenseReport.description: Completely calculated license report structure that is the result of a complete run.

AvailableLicense.description: Breakdown of the purchased licenses/service plans available in the tenant being audited for this run. Where the key is the ID of the service plan and the value is how many licenses are available/purchase for it.
AvailableLicense.title: License Report - Available Licenses

LicenseReport.title: License Report - Complete Object

LicenseEntitlement.Shield.description: Record that describes the purchased licenses for a specific tenant. More than one of these can be active at a single time.

CorrelationId.description: Used to correlate the license entitlements with other records.

EnterpriseDeviceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Devices that are allowed to be managed.

EnterpriseInterfaceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

EnterpriseIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Enterprise Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

EnterpriseUserCount.description: Count of Enterprise Users that are allowed to be managed.

NotValidAfter.description: Date that the entitlement expires at.

NotValidBefore.description: Date that the entitlement becomes active at.

PrivilegedDeviceCount.description: Count of Privileged Devices (PAW) that are allowed to be managed.

PrivilegedInterfaceCount.description: Count of Privileged Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

PrivilegedIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Privileged Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

PrivilegedUserCount.description: Count of Privileged Users that are allowed to be managed.

PurchaseId.description: This could be any value used to correlate the purchase operation to this entitlement record.

SpecializedDeviceCount.description: Count of Specialized Devices that are allowed to be managed.

SpecializedInterfaceCount.description: Count of Specialized Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

SpecializedIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Specialized Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

SpecializedUserCount.description: Count of Specialized Users that are allowed to be managed.

TenantId.description: Tenant that this license entitlement is valid for.

LicenseEntitlement.Shield.title: License Entitlement - SHIELD Record

EnterpriseDeviceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Devices that are allowed to be managed.

SpecializedIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Specialized Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

SpecializedUserCount.description: Count of Specialized Users that are allowed to be managed.

CorrelationId.description: Primary key for the table, used to correlate multiple telemetry records together.

EnterpriseDeviceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Devices that are deployed in the CX environment.

EnterpriseUserCount.description: Count of Enterprise Users that are deployed in the CX environment.

MonthlyActiveEntUsers.description: Number of active managed Enterprise users.

MonthlyActivePrivUsers.description: Number of active managed privileged users.

MonthlyActiveSpecUsers.description: Number of active managed Specialized users.

PrivilegedDeviceCount.description: Count of Privileged Devices (PAW) that are deployed in the CX environment.

PrivilegedUserCount.description: Count of Privileged Users that are deployed in the CX environment.

ShieldArchitectureVersion.description: Version number of the architecture that is deployed.

ShieldCoreVersion.description: Version number of the product that the product is running.

SpecializedDeviceCount.description: Count of Specialized Devices that are deployed in the CX environment.

SpecializedUserCount.description: Count of Specialized Users that are deployed in the CX environment.

TenantId.description: Tenant ID for the CX in question.

createdAt.description: Timestamp on when the record was created. This is auto managed by sequelize.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp on when the record was last updated. This is auto managed by sequelize.

Update.Shield.Check.description: Object returning the value of the version of the latest application package available.

updateVersion.description: Latest found version of the application package.

Update.Shield.Check.title: Update SHIELD Check - latest application package version

Update.Shield.Channel.description: Channel configuration for the SHIELD update service.

latest.description: Version number of the latest update available to the chanel.

name.description: (Unique) Name of the update channel that this configuration belongs to.

previous.description: Version number of the number that is being replaced via ring deployment, available to all rings at the minimum.

Update.Shield.Channel.title: SHIELD Update - Channel

latest.description: Flag that indicates if the ring should be operating off of the latest version number provided by the channel (`true`) or the previous (`false`).

number.description: Ring number that this configuration belongs to.

Update.Shield.Channel.Ring.title: Update SHIELD Channel Ring - configuration entry

alphaEnabled.description: Flag that indicates if the current tenant is allowed to request alpha builds (`true`) or not (`false`).

ring.description: Ring number that the client is a member of for the current chanel.

tenantId.description: Tenant ID that the configuration belongs to.

CustomerList.Record.title: Customer List Record
CustomerList.Record.description: Details of a single entry in the list of customer records

customerId.description: The object ID of the customer record

customerDisplayName.description: Human readable name for the customer record

Customer.Record.title: Customer Record
Customer.Record.description: Details of a single customer record requested directly that includes additional information

customerId.description: The object ID of the customer record

customerDisplayName.description: Human readable name for the customer record

tenantList.description: Object representing collection of tenant records that include tenant id and name and are associated with this customer record

additionalProperties.description: Human readable name for the tenant record

EntraID.description: The Access Token from Entra ID. Please note required scopes (permissions) in each endpoint.

info.description: Collects data from the various SHI Lab products and makes it available in a standardized way.
info.title: SHI Data Gateway

get.description: Check the health of the various components of the data gateway and report back. Useful for automated health probing.

500.description: Service has a failure described with following report.

get.summary: Health of the Service for Probing

post.description:
Store the results of a license analytics run.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

License Report.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment.

Ignorant License Report Request.description: Clueless dev trying to automate this application without reading the docs. RTFM!

License Report.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment.

get.description:
Retrieves the list of correlation records for the authenticated tenant. Correlation records store the metadata for a specific license report.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read`,  `LicenseReport.Read.All`, `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

Example License Report.description: Sample list of correlation records for the authenticated tenant.

get.summary: Retrieve the List of Correlation Records

get.description:
Retrieves the list of correlation records for the specified tenant. Correlation records store the metadata for a specific license report.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read.All`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

Example License Report.description: Sample list of correlation records for the authenticated tenant.

get.summary: Retrieve the List of Correlation Records for Specified Tenant

get.description:
Retrieves the full license report for the specified correlation ID in the authenticated tenant. The license report contains all of the license usage and compliance information with the required correlation data.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read`, `LicenseReport.Read.All`, `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

License Report.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment.

get.description:
Retrieves the full license report for the specified correlation ID and tenant. The license report contains all of the license usage and compliance information with the required correlation data.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read.All`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

License Report.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment.

get.summary: Retrieve the Specified License Report for Specified Tenant

delete.description:
Deletes the full license report for the specified correlation ID and tenant.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.
delete.summary: Delete the Specified License Report for Specified Tenant

post.description:
Creates a new license entitlement (activation) for SHIELD.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseEntitlement.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

Specialized Purchase.description: Add-on purchase for the specified customer for some additional specialized licenses.

Initial Purchase.description: Complete suite of components purchased for the specified customer.

Ignorant Entitlement Creation Request.description: Clueless dev trying to automate this application without reading the docs. RTFM!

Small MSP.description: Example license entitlement for a small MSP.

Enterprise.description: Example license entitlement for an enterprise sized company.

post.summary: Creates a new License Entitlement for SHIELD.

get.description: Retrieves the count of licenses that are available to the authenticated tenant. No scopes (permissions) required.

Small MSP.description: Example active license count for a small MSP.

No Licenses.description: Example license count for a company that doesn't have any licenses.

Enterprise.description: Example active license count for an enterprise sized company.

get.description:
Retrieves the list of license entitlements that are assigned to the specified tenant.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseEntitlement.Read.All`, or `LicenseEntitlement.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.
get.summary: List of Entitlement Records for Specified Tenant

delete.description:
Deletes the requested SHIELD license entitlement record.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseEntitlement.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

post.description:
Submits the telemetry report for SHIELD.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite`, or `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

Monthly Report.description: Example monthly telemetry report for an enterprise organization.
Example monthly telemetry report for an enterprise organization.

get.description:
Retrieves the telemetry records that have been reported for the authenticated tenant. Data is not guaranteed to be retrieved in any specific order.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.Read`, `Telemetry.Shield.Read.All`, `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite`, or `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

List of Reports.description: List of all available telemetry reports for the authenticated tenant.

get.description:
Retrieves the telemetry records that have been reported for the specified tenant. Data is not guaranteed to be retrieved in any specific order.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.Read.All`, or `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

List of Reports.description: List of all available telemetry reports for the authenticated tenant.

delete.description:
Deletes the specified telemetry record for the specified tenant.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

get.description:
Retrieves all of the channel configurations that are present in the update service.

This endpoint requires the `UpdateShield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI Lab` tenant. End user access is restricted.

500.description: Request has a failure that cannot be resolved and might require manual intervention or retry.

get.description:
Retrieves configuration for the specific channel from the update service.

This endpoint requires the `UpdateShield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI Lab` tenant. End user access is restricted.

500.description: Request has a failure that cannot be resolved and might require manual intervention or retry.

patch.description:
Updates (or adds when missing) the specified channel configuration.

This endpoint requires the `UpdateShield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible form the `SHI Lab` tenant. End user access is restricted.

latest.description: Flag that indicates if the ring should be operating off of the latest version number provided by the channel (`true`) or the previous (`false`).

number.description: Ring number that this configuration belongs to.

get.description: Retrieves the latest available version of the package for the running application. Version depends on the channel associated with the current tenant, or channel mentioned in the request, or default channel value. Applicable channel would be calculated on the server for each request.

displayName.description: Optional string representing human readable name for the records.
